community.name: VRosity
community.description: VRosity is a video production community that specializes in creating new and innovating VR video productions & techniques.

community.name: Local Police Department
community.description:
Welcome the LPD, one of VRChats oldest and largest roleplaying groups bringing entertainment to public lobbies since 2018. The LPD hosts daily VRChat events where officers are assigned to a squad to create roleplay scenarios in public lobbies, themed around interactions with the public and emergency services. Due to the nature of improv, anything can happen during these events. From drug busts and shootouts, to checking mirror dwelling licenses. 

To join the LPD check out the recruitment channel on our Discord at <color=#7289daff>discord.gg/lpd</color>. There you will find the application form as well as our handbook which is packed with all kinds of important information. Once accepted you will go through cadet training, before jumping into patrolling VRChat as an official LPD officer. When you have some experience under your belt you can take additional training to move up the ranks or specialize into other kinds of roleplay that we offer.

Patrol officers will arrest people and bring them to the LPD station to take their mugshot that then gets posted on our discord server for everyone to see. If they choose to not come quietly we have our swat team, known as SLRT, to help persuade them. Once the suspect has been processed they will be handed over to our Corrections Officers and given a nice new home in the LPD Prison with all the other prisoners. And if anyone gets hurt in the process they can be treated by the LMT at our Hospital. To find out how you can help keep the streets of VRChat safe, join our Discord or follow us on Twitter @LPD_vr.

community.name: Metropolitan Police Service
community.description: We're a friendly police RP community, who patrol worlds of VRChat. As you can see, we have been heavily influenced by the real UK Met Police, which is of course our inspiration, and what we have based our department on.

community.name: Ookami Collective
community.description: We are a Hub for people that loves Mikos and Ukon Avatars in General. our fanatism of these models/Characters, is what makes us happy.

community.name: Megabuilding 325
community.description:
Do you make anything? Music, painting, textures, 3D, 2D, animations, sculptures, etc ? Do you open for commissions? Do you also roleplay? Do you wish you had a virtual store? Do I have your attention yet? Then you should consider joining MEGABUILDING 325!

M325 is a cyberpunk inspired roleplay group. If you enjoy stuff like Ghost in the Shell, Blade Runner, Apex, Titanfall, Akira, The Finals, Cyberpunk and more, then you'll fit right in! We offer creators of all kinds a place to hold a store (no Unity knowledge needed) and do some roleplay with a map that evolves with the players! 

Not a creator? Not a problem! Just come RP, join the guild, run missions and more! Found something cool in a mission? We'll add it to the map! That's right, what you do truly impacts the map here at M325.  Lobbies are every Tuesdays at 7:30 pm eastern. We are also Quest tolerant (Questies be warned, we do not impose players to have Quest avatars. Use your imagination, buddy.)

community.name: 7th Legion
community.description: The 7th Legion of VRChat is an Avatar PvP community that participates in a variety of events (social, combat, rp, so on) within the group, community, and beyond!

community.name: United Republic
community.description: The United Republic is a multi-purpose PVP community and social hub, One of the oldest and still running PvP Star wars Communities on VR Chat. Events are hosted regularly by the week, participating in world hops, PVP matches with other Avatar PvP communities, Different types of Light RP, Large Scale Re-Created battles and more. Our leadership team is friendly and active with a large player base and many regulars. We welcome any and all to participate and enjoy the community we've grown!

community.name: Uganda
community.description: Do u kno de wey? Clucking since 2017

community.name: The Mighty Gym
community.description: The Mighty Gym is the ultimate social fitness experience in VRǃ Join us for group classes of up to 30 people‚ lead by real certified instructors‚ where you can test your fitness skills in one of our 9 themed workouts․ With technology to track your form‚ and give you a score for your performance‚ you can be sure to hit your fitness goals and have loads of fun with your friends every timeǃ

community.name: Neon Divide
community.description:
The World's Largest Episodic Virtual Reality Production!
Neon Divide has a cast of over 150 Characters across four world maps. Using VRChat’s platform, we have been able to find a user-friendly way to host this large scale production. All the maps and avatars are custom-made with Neon Divide in mind. While the overall storyline and plot are written and directed by professional game masters, the majority of the story is created in real-time as events unfold in this living world.

community.name: Legions Of Chaos
community.description: The Legions of Chaos is a VRChat PCVR Avatar PVP Group, which uses the Avatar PVP system created by GoFluffYaSelf!

community.name: Little Renegades
community.description: A street gang based on 1990s-2000s era. We roam around the VRchat verse seeing what kind of trouble we can get into.

community.name: Metaverse Degen
community.description: A podcast⁄talk show in vrchat where are interview the various personalities and communities from the platform Vrchat including club owners‚ djs‚ tiktokers‚ vtubers world and avatar creators and more․ Featuring˸ dirtyraptor & LionTurtle

community.name: Tuatha Dé Danann
community.description:
Welcome to Tuatha Dé Danann, a community which revolves around a hidden society of mages and their many associates‚ all of which have evaded the ever-watching eyes of a world ruled by corrupt Megacorps․

We'll be offering a variety of fun and unique activities for our members‚ such as story-based events‚ hangouts‚ game nights‚ and many moreǃ It should also be mentioned that the Tuatha Dé Danann isn't just for members of our community‚ but also for friends and and people looking to have funǃ If you're still reading this‚ then we've probably caught your interest․ Perhaps continue and see what else is in store?

community.name: AWMC Industries
community.description:
Step into the boundless universe of the Allied Waifu Military Core Industries also known as AI‚ your premier universewide military arms dealerǃ
Set in the spacefaring era of the year 2200＋‚ AWMC Industries stands as a beacon of innovation in the vast expanse of space․

When Earth fell victim to an unknown extraterrestrial force during the chaos of the Third World War‚ advanced weaponry‚ including machine soldiers powered by artificial intelligence‚ clashed in a desperate bid for survival․ Amidst the devastation‚ these androids emerged‚ alerting humanity to the imminent threat approaching earth․
Despite the warnings‚ blinded by greed‚ many humans ignored the approaching catastrophe․ Until it was too late․
A select few androids and humans escaped Earth's demise‚ vowing to safeguard humanity's legacy and principles․ Thus‚ they founded a military dedicated to preserving these ideals‚ recognizing that a formidable arsenal is the way of survival․
Emerging as a prominent arms manufacturer and formidable military force‚ AI stands as a beacon of strength and integrity‚ its vast fleet traversing the galaxies to uphold its values․

Whether you're a seasoned spacefarer or a green recruit‚ AI welcomes all to forge the destiny of galaxies․ Enlist today and be the bastion of humanitys legacy․

Caution˸ Enlisting requires disposal of your biological embodiment․

community.name: 1st Weimar Republic
community.description:
Welcome to the 1st Weimar Republic!

We’re an alternate history VRChat roleplay group based around 1920's Interwar Germany.

We host weekly immersive RP events in the Weimar Republic;
Daily Life of Soldiers
Combat RP
Military Training
Ceremonies

From fighting in the street and countryside against uprisings to simply living out the daily life of a soldier, our events tell an ongoing narrative influenced by all of our members. Want to know more? If Immersive RP, Alt-History or History, and an interesting story appeal to you, then the 1st Weimar Republic is the place for you!

https://discord.gg/ZMP49H3zSY

Join now, become part of our growing community, and leave your mark upon the Republic!

community.name: Dream Tree Cafe
community.description: A Roleplay about a cafe set within a dream world, allowing anyone from any world/RP to come take part in how they please.

community.name: Omega
community.description: Omega serves as both AstrixZ's Content Creation Community, whereby enjoyers of her content join to meet her, as well as a community dedicated to experiencing new things in VRC and keeping things fresh. Members are encouraged to meet new friends, join events & have fun, do something new and try new experiences. Omega is also a server for creators to showcase their craft, may it be Video/Audio Production, Avatar/World Creation, and many more!

community.name: Atelier Maineria
community.description: Avatar commissions

community.name: Danger Noodle Animations
community.description: A cyberpunk shop for cell shaded assets. We're a small group of friends working on fan animation and props to sell.

community.name: Allied Waifu Marine Corps (AWMC)
community.description: We are a developing and growing social community based on structure and elements from the United States Marine Corps that primarily plays the social VR game VRChat. We are an open community for anyone with a common interest in military themes, games or people who enjoy good company.

community.name: Noved Squad
community.description:
Welcome to the Noved Squadǃ 

Home of the Noved Notes Podcastǃ
A VRChat Podcast that goes into the amazing creators of VRChatǃ

In the Noved Squad Community‚ we do a bunch of hangouts‚ game nights‚ DJ Noved Party Nights‚ and collaborate to make amazing creations on VRChatǃ Overall we just like to have funǃ

If you are a creator ⁄ community rep that is interested in being on the podcast‚ join the discord and submit an applicationǃ

community.name: RWBY Journey Beyond Remnant
community.description:
RWBY JBR is a Canon multi-crossover AU VRC RP that has a wide variety of characters from a variety of different series and franchises that come together in one place.

The focus of the roleplay will be on exploring the different plot points of each season, delving into the perspectives of each character. It's worth noting that certain significant details might undergo alterations, like the demise of a character or a shift in the timeline of events. As seasons unfolds, we'll remain engaged in the otherworldly realm or dimension we find ourselves in. Throughout the replay, the choices you make will shape your character, highlighting both your strengths and weaknesses. Moreover, your decisions will also have a direct impact on the overall narrative of the story

community.name: Anime Ships United
community.description:
The Anime Ships United (ASU) are a group of shipgirl fans come together to enjoy sharing and talking about warships and shipgirls from all fandoms.
We also do weekly game nights along with random RP moments.
Over all we are a chill hangout group for the most part, though if folks want to be more RP engaged we also have the United Shipgirl Navy (USN) which is a more RP focused sub-group and just getting its feet wet, the USN will be doing weekly RP events and has a dedicated tabletop game that the members play weekly.
If you like or love ships or interested in all things boat and shipgirl then come join the navy!

community.name: The Bakery
community.description: The Bakery is a group of artists that primarily focus on digital art, 3d animation, and virtual reality environments, primarily based in VRChat. We enjoy creating stories with our art, and giving people something to enjoy!

community.name: Resurrected Mercenaries PMC
community.description:
"We are a light mercenary RP group that focuses on roleplay scenarios with other groups &
organizations. Our main goal is to have **FUN** not just with ourselves but with all who we
interact with."

community.name: Wysteria
community.description: Hello, I am a 2D Illustrator who specializes in fun and dynamic anime inspired illustrations! I do commissions for both custom Illustrations and emote Illustrations.

community.name: VR Japan Tours
community.description: VR Japan Tours is an immersive virtual tour where you can experience the culture and art of Japan in the sophisticated Japanese virtual world with friendly guides and amazing performers.

community.name: Hidden Reality
community.description: Hidden Reality specializes in hosting mind-blowing virtual raves that redefine the traditional club experince. Our community thrives on innovation, constantly seeking to enhance the virtual experience for all members.

community.name: SKULLco
community.description: SKULLco is a brand focused on developing digital assets. These assets come in a wide variety. From 3dmodels, to videos, sounds files, VFX and so on. Our main strength is 3d assets of the SciFI/Cyberpunk themes. However, we have skills in developing all different styles. SKULLco takes pride in the attnetion to detail. Not only making good looking assets, but assets that function consistantly and properly. You can find our assets at either our Gumroad or Booth stores.

community.name: xCirrex Media
community.description: Monthly tournaments in xCirrex's PVP worlds, community hangouts and concerts!

community.name: ARK Station VRChat Avatar PVP
community.description: ARK Station is a VRChat Community HUB Based on Creativity, Interaction, and Having Fun. We aim to create a server/environment for people to relax, enjoy, or just hang out after a long day of Work, School, or Life. While also focusing on being able to interact with your friends on a whole new level. Providing a place where you can download Prefabs based on this idea of interaction. Letting Players Create their Avatars or Worlds And using them in our Events. We aim to push the limits of what VRChat can be, not only the things we create but each other. We are a VRChat community HUB, and all communities are welcome.

community.name: NanoBunTV
community.description: 🥕 Professional Idiot Robo-Bunny from the virtual world! 🥕 Jack of all trades, master of... maybe a few (but it's all too much to fit into this little bio)

community.name: Team Nakama Vibes
community.description: The Official Home of The Self-Employed Idiots™ - A group of “semi-functional” homies out on a mission to spread some good vibes.

community.name: Children of Time
community.description: We are a improv RP group that is a magic and steampunk style.

community.name: The Synapse
community.description: We are a fun-loving community focusing on weekly VR games and events. Along with games and events, we emphasize art and media creation, support for artists, manga development, and community fundraising and charities. The Synapse aims to be the community guides of VRChat, providing an amazing and friendly place for people to hangout and be themselves.

community.name: TF2 Avatar PvP
community.description: we are a Avatar PvP community that is PC only do to the combat being on PC but we wish to spread the love and joy of TF2 and have fun.

community.name: Forjadores Hispanic community of VRChat
community.description: We are a community of Hispanic creators that gets together to help and share knowledge about worlds, avatars and general content for VRChat. We have regular events on Sundays and our big event called "Forjaversario" where we celebrate the anniversary of our community.

community.name: DalekHQ
community.description: Welcome to the Dalek HQ, the Go-to Doctor Who Fan  Community of VRChat. There is something for everyone in this community, wether you like to RP as a Dalek  or Doctor Who Character in-game, Show of your tactical prowess in  PvP, exercise your artistic side  in our discord Competitions, or show your devotion to the empire and work your way up the ranks.

community.name: Kryptik
community.description: We are a group that specializes in bringing in unique events with interesting challenges.

community.name: ART BAR
community.description: Step into ART BAR, a unique VRChat world where creativity knows no bounds. Explore stunning art pieces, groove to live DJ music, and engage with a vibrant community. Join us at ART BAR and experience art like never before!

community.name: Scenario One
community.description: A space for short-form roleplay

community.name: WaterWolf
community.description: WaterWolf: WaterWolf is a community focused on building, exploring, and promoting immersive and enjoyable worlds through creating amazing assets, tools, technologies, avatars, and worlds and hosting some of the best events. The community offers a great opportunity to make new friends, explore and learn new skills, and make amazing memories together.

community.name: The Great Religion
community.description: We are avid pug goers, and also we are home to Celeste-AI!

community.name: Interlopr
community.description: Cyberpunk-themed music event and RP community

community.name: Metacosm Studios
community.description: Metacosm Studios is an indie‚ virtual film studio that produces movies‚ short films‚ and episodic series shot entirely in VRChat.

community.name: The Game Show Community of VRChat
community.description: GSGenesis and his friends/fellow game show fans operate and organize VR-based recreations of popular TV game shows from past and present! Attracting players since 2017, the Game Show Community of VRChat and its affiliates continue to provide a near-impossible life experience to thousands!

community.name: VRDancing
community.description:
"VRDancing is a beginner-friendly community of dancers that host weekly dance, fitness and hangout events in EU and NA timezones. We welcome any dancer! 

No Full Body Tracking required, some even join without VR! 

Whether you just started and lack confidence, or are a veteran dancer with years of IRL experience, we hope you'll find your place here! 

Our main dancing events are accessible to any skill level and are an excellent place to start dancing in VRChat! "

community.name: TailBass
community.description:
TailBass is a coalition of international DJs, dance and music club organizers, event hosts, programmers, lighting and video experts, and developers from all across the VRChat furry community. They selflessly volunteer their time, energy, and expertise to host awesome and stunning rave events for the furry community and friends.

Many organizations throughout VRChat incorporate TailBass specialists to enhance their club experience, with weekly raves held across multiple timezones. TailBass personnel have also helped host major joint-efforts and raves between multiple organizations, including WaterWolf and Vibe Night, and for major events such as New Years Eve.

community.name: Projekto Babel
community.description: Project Babel is multilingual group in VRChat․

community.name: Wardens of Leefside
community.description:
"Wardens of Leefside is a flintlock fantasy roleplay set in a unique 17th century inspired world, blending swords, sorcery, and the spirit of early modern adventure. Join as a resident of the coastal Town of Leefside - where magic, elemental spirits, and gunpowder all coexist.

We're a community-focused roleplay with a player-driven narrative guided by a dedicated team of full-time GMs

We host sessions every Monday for people of all experience levels with roleplay
Please check our discord.gg/leefside to see when we open for applications! "

community.name: SCP Foundation of VR
community.description: The SCP Foundation of VRChat is a roleplay community inspired by the SCP universe. We utilize our own content and lore to keep things new and engaging. Players can create their own characters, anomalies and stories and have it all played out in our weekly events.

community.name: CozyCon Online
community.description: CozyCon is a free yearly multi-fandom virtual convention on Discord/VRChat/Twitch that runs in September, but also hosts monthly events. We have skilled vendors, DJs and Panelists every year, sweet themed merch designed by our artists, and year-round community space to chat, organize games, share your creative works and much more.

community.name: Fractured Thrones
community.description: Fractured Thrones is a low-fantasy medieval roleplay inspired by LOTR‚ and Warhammer Fantasy‚ and created by Mr․ Brunswick․ It is comprised of many different role-players‚ custom assets‚ and tons of hard work and dedication․ We welcome new facesǃ

community.name: Shopow's Corner
community.description:
"Haiǃ Welcome to Shopow's Corner‚ for all friends to join and have funǃ I will also post updates‚ world releases‚ and memes in hereǃ I'll occasionally promote worlds‚ events‚ and content made by friends who need helpǃ Let's spread wholesome and positive vibes throughout VRChatǃ 

Be sure to join our Discord Server to hang and meet more wonderful and wholesome peopleǃ

Created on˸ January 5th‚ 2021"

community.name: Virtual Market
community.description:
"One of world's largest VR events - a virtual exhibition of 3D avatars and assets, physical products (fashion, PCs, food products, etc.) on the metaverse

*The Guinness World Record™ was achieved for having ""most booths at a virtual reality market event""."

community.name: TheCrossRoads
community.description: A Bar Where You Pay With Confessions.

community.name: Ultramarines
community.description: We are pvp multi purpose community and a social hub for all the people who love 40k, pvp or just want to lay back and a good time.

community.name: The Blood Ravens
community.description: The Blood Ravens are a multi-purpose PVP community and social hub, One of the oldest still running Warhammer Community on VR Chat. Events are hosted regularly by the week, participating in world hops, PVP matches with other Warhammer communities, Laserdome tournaments, game nights, and more. Our leadership team is friendly and active with a large playerbase and many regulars. We welcome any and all to participate and enjoy the community we've grown.

community.name: Wolveeps Fan Club
community.description: Wolveeps Fan club is fun inspirational community around Wovleeps creatives works and content․ We hold events‚ hangouts‚ and meetups․

community.name: Silk Space
community.description: We are a cluster of digital artisans surfing the web to connect and grow together. Stay tuned for out of this world experiences!

community.name: Black Box Protocol
community.description: "A mixed media RP made with the ideals of creativity and letting multiple people show their RP ideas and host in a safe space for people to find same-interested people!"

community.name: Traveling Circus
community.description: A group of people who like to entertain with their avatars providing entertainment for others as well as to teach, educate, and inspire others to start along their avatar creating way.  Whether large shows or small venues we provide entertainment for both randoms and other communities to bring smiles and lighten up the atmosphere! so whether your an audience member or an entertainer sit back, relax, and enjoy the show!

community.name: The VR-Photography Club
community.description:
The VR-Photography Club is the oldest photography club in VRChat (founded in October 2021). It was founded by a handful of people who share the love for the photography in VRChat. The VR-Photography Club mainly focuses on learning and improving your photography skills, sharing your works, and meeting and making new friends.
We have:
Monthly contest
Bi-weekly meetups
Ability to share your works
Meet other photographers

community.name: LAB Unit
community.description: L.A.B. UNIT is an active PMC Roleplay group for those who don't want too many boundaries on personal characters and strive for a good standing with other groups. We host private roleplay events, joint operations, contracts with other mil-sim/roleplay communities, and handle everything from basic security to existential threats.

community.name: The Grey Knights 40k PVP
community.description:
"The Grey Knights are a secret, mysterious Loyalist Chapter of Space Marines specifically tasked with combating the dangerous daemonic entities of the Warp and all those who wield the corrupt power of the Chaos Gods

Our Group is based on the Grey Knights. Join us to participate with multiple weekly PVP events, Game Nights, Movie Nights, and VRchat Filming."

community.name: Skits'N'Bits
community.description: We're a creative‚ fun‚ and welcoming improv community offering weekly workshops for all skill levels 18 and older and serve as a hub for skits‚ sketches, projects‚ and other VR performative collabsǃ

community.name: Kochō no Yakuza
community.description:
We are a roleplay VRChat community themed after the Yakuza game series and Japanese culture in general. We wish to provide, bring together and entertain. 

Providing a friendlier place for VRChat public to roleplay in is one of the aims we wish to achieve, alongside with helping other communities with bigger projects.

Bringing together both new and veteran players who have nowhere else to go, educate people about VRChat as a whole and keeping them up to date on what is going on in this vast but confusing place.

Entertaining both the public and our own people with external and internal roleplay which are still in development. Giving people a place to feel welcomed and a place anybody can feel they belong to.

community.name: Pool Parlor
community.description: The Pool Parlor is a community striving to make a strong connection with everyone and one of the best pool tables around!

community.name: Soaring Fitness
community.description: We are a VR-based workout group, focused on being freely accessible. Our hard working team of Volunteers offer their time and experience to make it all possible. Our Certified Personal Trainers work with our Volunteer Instructors to bring you workouts 7 days a week! We believe good health and fitness should not be gated behind a paywall!

community.name: RIFT
community.description: We are a sci-fi, lore based rave community focused on uplifting and promoting those in the VRC rave scene in a positive direction!

community.name: Rindo Cult
community.description: Built upon a foundation of love towards the Rindo base model (By Jingo Channel), Rindo cult is a fusion blend of cultures and bases, proud to offer a place of unity and joy to all. Whether you seek intellectual discussions, artistic collaborations, or simply a space to unwind and let loose, Rindo Cult offers it all. With events that span across all time zones of the world Rindo *Not-A-Cult* welcomes you with open arms, no matter your affinity!

community.name: United Police Department
community.description: The United Police Department functions as a roleplaying community, venturing across various virtual worlds to craft engaging scenarios for Vrchat players to witness or take part in. Beyond our roleplay endeavors, we organize enjoyable events aimed at fostering connections within the community and forging lasting friendships.

community.name: Clone Troopers of VRChat
community.description:
"The Clone Troopers of VRChat is a group of Star Wars fans that use VRChat as a platform for Clone Wars oriented combat and role play events. We are a PC/VR only community that uses maps created by the community development team and avatars made by the avatar creation team to immerse ourselves in the world of Star Wars!

We have two roles available depending on how you would like to be involved in the community. Cadet is for those who wish to participate in combat events by joining a battalion. Visitor is for those who want to hang around in the discord or are unable to participate in combat events due to system restrictions. While being a visitor, you may also become an Astromech for certain battalions. Astromechs are allowed to join events and sometimes participate depending on the game mode.

We host a wide range of events, majority of which are spontaneous, but there are always a few scheduled. Our Main event is hosted every Tuesday, Thursday, and Saturday at 7 pm Eastern Standard Time. We also have cadet tryouts, battalion tryouts and many more combat oriented events throughout the day. The event host will announce the events through the discord server for anyone to join!"

community.name: Death Korps of VR
community.description: Established in 2019, the Death Korps of VR is a Avatar PVP / Role play group dedicated to the Death Korps of Krieg Regiment of the Astra Militarum in the Warhammer 40,000 Universe. The Kriegsmen of the Death Korps are steadfast soldiers of the Imperium of Man. They grind down their enemies with attrition, artillery, and zeal. Got what it takes to join the Korp? Jump in the trench line and charge forward for the emperor, shovel ,bayonet, and lasgun in hand.

community.name: The Necron Empire
community.description:
The Necron Empire is a VRChat based Avatar PvP group‚ we use these Avatars to fight Duells all the way to 40 people Battles with the Theme being from Warhammer 40k․ （Dark Sci-Fi）

We enjoy a loose culture in our group and encourage a good‚ fun but semi serious attitude․

Due to how our system works we are a PC only community

community.name: Hoppou Foundation
community.description: We're The Hoppou Foundationǃ We're Hoppou Raiders‚ Role-players‚ Gamers‚ Avatar & World Creators‚ Artists and moreǃ

community.name: Abyssal Poilice Division
community.description: Abyssal Poilice Division is The Home & Hub of our Officer, Enforcer, Detective and Mage Role-Play's, Serving as The Janky Fun Peace Keepers & Brutal Enforcers of our Abyss.

community.name: Ministry Promotions
community.description: Aproffessional & strategic option for vr event logistics an promotions

community.name: MrDummy_NL Fan and Support
community.description: I make worlds with mind for deaf people and work together with Helping Hands for Sign&Fun world.

community.name: Chimkins
community.description:
We are a small team working on VRChat worlds and planning to release more in the future. Our main goal is to make a world that is fun to play and great for hanging out with friends.

We currently have 3 worlds released publicly:
- Zombie Survival
- The Hunt
- Deagle Duel

community.name: Disciples of Tron
community.description: A community focused on doing casual and semi-competitive events for the TRON franchise, including but not limited to: Battle Discs, Lightcycle arena, and other TRON-themed hangout worlds or clubs.

community.name: No Friends Friends Club
community.description: A social group and gathering that focuses on helping people struggling with social anxiety to come out and practice social skills while making friends along the way.

community.name: Neo-Philly CyberBar
community.description: Neo-Philly CyberBar is a casual cyberpunk RP that takes places in 2060s America where AI and the climate crisis have combined to fracture the world. The Roleplay takes place in The Alibi, a dive bar in the Neo-Philly Anti-AI Resistance Zone, where characters can order drinks and chat. Come join us and don't forget: We don't serve AI here!

community.name: Studio Penrose
community.description: Studio Penrose is an independent VR film studio striving to make new and unique lore-driven stories. The group is comprised of many members of all backgrounds who work together to create films for all audiences to enjoy.

community.name: Projekt G.A.T.E
community.description:
Projekt G.A.T.E is based off the anime/manga called, "Jieitai Kanochi Nite, Kaku Tatakaeri or GATE: Thus, the Japanese Self-Defense Force Fought There."

We carry loadouts that the JSDF uses in the anime/manga with slow progression towards modern loadouts."

community.name: Portuguese Armed Forces
community.description:
We are a VRChat Military Simulation Roleplay group based on the Armed Forces of Portugal! In our wonderful community you have a lot of things you can
do from enjoying your time as a civilian to enlisting in our ranks and have amazing experiences in our events, trainings, hangouts and operations.
Our goal is to make a welcoming community for everyone to enjoy while sharing a little bit of what the Portuguese are about, this is the place for you to
make new friends and enjoy your time, on top of that you can even get your own custom avatar to wear in our events, so what are you waiting for?

community.name: VRelium
community.description:
VRelium is a dynamic and inclusive community within VRChat‚ built around a shared passion for music and creativity․ We are dedicated to supporting and showcasing the talents of virtual artists‚ DJs‚ and performers‚ providing a platform for them to connect with audiences and share their craft in meaningful ways.

At the heart of VRelium is the belief that music has the power to bring people together‚ and we aim to create unforgettable experiences that inspire connection and collaboration․ Through our events‚ we celebrate the diverse and ever-evolving virtual music scene‚ from intimate performances to large-scale festivals․


Charity is a key part of what we do‚ as we believe in using our platform to make a positive impact․ By hosting charity-focused festivals‚ we bring the community together to support important causes and demonstrate the potential of VR to create real-world change․


VRelium is more than just a place for music, its a space for building friendships‚ exploring creativity‚ and shaping the future of VR entertainment․ 

Whether youre an artist‚ a performer‚ or someone who simply loves music‚ VRelium is a welcoming space where you can be part of something bigger

community.name: FireteamVR
community.description: FireteamVR is a passion project aimed at becoming the first massive PvP-integrated avatar community in VRChat. Participate in battlefield-inspired firefights in any world, featuring unique military-anime-style PvP avatars with interactive weapons and high customizations

community.name: Family Friendly Cult
community.description: The group is mostly just a chill hangout group originally made for people "enjoying" the Uko avatars (still dont know why anyone would). We do weekly events such as playing various games, hanging out or exploring different places in Vrchat.

community.name: Galactic Republic of VRChat
community.description: We are a community of people in VRChat who are passionate about the Prequels era of Star Wars that hosts hangout events every Saturday with additional side events in between!

community.name: Furry Event Community
community.description: Welcome to the Furry Event Community! This is your go-to hub for all things furry events. Whether you're looking to attend conventions, participate in online meetups, or share your own events, you'll find a friendly and inclusive space here. Connect with fellow furries, stay updated on upcoming events, and dive into engaging discussions. Join us and be part of a vibrant community where the fun never stops!

community.name: Blue Star
community.description:
"We are a role-playing community inspired by games and media such as the SCP wiki, Lobotomy Corporation and Blue Archive.

In our role-playing group, our members are part of Blue Star, a security and research company that conducts research and experiments on abnormal objects and physical manifestations, that artificially aren't possible.
We operate under-ground, seeming to be just an ordinary security facility on the surface. While researching and containing abnormalities to protect the public. Preserving artifacts, and getting to abnormalities first before other organizations can do so, preventing them from being exploited. We use Rifts, in addition as well, to move our personnel to other parts of the multi-verse."

community.name: Hoppou Sanctuary
community.description:
We are Hoppou Sanctuary․ A Vrchat Hoppou Community that our goal is create a safehaven for everyone․

We do hoppou raids․

Events of all kinds And Also have a whole part dedicated to story telling and media creation from videos to more․

community.name: Boothplorer
community.description: A third-party item and avatar catalogue for VRChat.

community.name: ArgusVRC
community.description: We are a team and community creating a Sword Art Online VRChat game. Our project features an interactive world, save systems, PVP/PVE combat, and community events. Join us to experience the world of Sword Art Online in VRChat!

community.name: Teal Banner
community.description:
The Teal Banner is a RolePlay community based on a completely hand written lore set in a medieval fantasy land based on writings by DeliriousJax. Come and learn of the world as you explore Kingdoms, discover magic, and help guide the path of fates! Focusing on minimal dice rolling in favor of quality of story and player actions, this roleplay brings the story and immersion to the forefront of our experiences and interactions.

Whether you'd like to keep it humble as a Clergy, seek the mysticism of a Magical studier, craft and design runes as a Runesmith, or you wish to wield the authority of a Crown sworn sword; there are many ways to pursue your part in this long term story telling community!

Human, Elf, Beastkin, Halfling, Dwarf. You choose your starting point and begin the life of n adventurer in the Chronicles of Wyl!

community.name: Study-Japanese【 JapaNichijou ジャパ日常 】
community.description:
Our community is made up of people who have come together with the goal of enjoying learning Japanese.  
We host events twice every weekend, where we explore various ways to practice Japanese, including Japanese lessons, games using Japanese Language, and role-playing events that simulate real-life communication.  
If you're interested in Japanese Language or Japanese culture, feel free to stop by and join us! ありがとう！
